commands.Name: --group
commands.ShortHelp: Send message to a named group of contacts. Sub command of text.

commands.Name: --verbose
commands.ShortHelp: Sub command of list. Tells list to list all info on a contact.  Default is false.

commands.Name: list
commands.ShortHelp: List contacts saved.  A space separated list of quoted names can be given

commands.Name: text
commands.ShortHelp: The number to send the message to
commands.LongHelp:
text command allows users to pass one or more phone numbers to send messages to.
Using the --group sub-command lets them pass in one or more named group contacts.
Since the command may take multiple parameters the list must end with the sentinel value 
which is two dashes --
example: message text 212-555-1212... --
using --group: message text -g winners "fan boys"... --
